body: Sure, you can work on it! Any issue is unassigned until there is a PR to fix it.
is changing the name enough or do I have to make other relevant changes?
Just need to rename the file and update all places which are referencing it.
Hey, I completed this. Shall i create a branch and and then create a Pull Request?

I'm getting this error:
"remote: Permission to mozilla/bugbug.git denied to hmrishavbandy." ,
when i am trying to push my changes. I am using the terminal and am on Ubuntu 19.04.
You need to push them to your fork, not to the upstream repository.
Thanks a lot @marco-c  for all this help. You helped make this fun :D
@marco-c  Can I take up this issue,since there is no PR for it?
marco-c  I am new to open source contribution . This issue is not closed yet . Can I take up this issue .
@marco-c I am new to open source contribution, and as this issue is not closed yet. Can I take this?
Hi All its weekend so Marco most probably is on leave, @hzk120 please go ahead and make the PR if you need any help comment here :)
@marco-c  If this issue is still open. Can I work on it ?

@Patil2099 read CONTRIBUTING.md. You can work on any open issue which has no PR linked to it.
This one doesn't have a open PR linked to it, so it's not assigned.
